alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 10:39AM CDT until June 06 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. .With rainfall anticipated over the next 24 hours, river levels along the Forest River will be on the rise. The river is expected to rise into Minor flood stage by midweek before falling back into Action stage by the weekend. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. During high flow, river may bypass Minto to the south and flow into Lake Ardoch. Urban flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 2.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning to a crest of 7.9 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
